original_text: So the man went away and began to tell in the Decapolis how much Jesus had done for him. And all the people were amazed.
korean_text: 그가 가서 예수께서 자기에게 어떻게 큰 일 행하셨는지를 데가볼리에 전파하니 모든 사람이 놀랍게 여기더라

sentences.original_text: and began to tell in the Decapolis
how much Jesus had done for him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 그를 위해 얼마나 많은 일을 하셨는지를

sentences.original_text: And all the people were amazed
